籤詩版本二:
Layin zinari yana daidaita zuciyarka, babu raguwa, babu karuwa, babu nauyi
Yana da madaidaiciyar zuciya a tsawon rayuwarsa, kuma labaransa duk suna da haske kuma fasaharsa tana da haske, Bei yana nufin Beizi a matsayin taska. Bei yana da kayan aiki.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana wakiltar hankali mai natsuwa da miƙewa.
Komai yana da ƙarfi kuma ba tare da haɗari ba.
解曰: Kwanciyar hankali da mutunci. A ƙarshe, zaman lafiya da kwanciyar hankali. Kawai ku bi aikin ku. Duniya tana zaman lafiya.
籤詩故事一:
◇Jinjing yayi gwajin Douer
Dou Yanshan ya yi ayyuka nagari kuma ya tara kyawawan dabi’u, ya kuma haifi ‘ya’ya maza biyar, duk sun samu nasara. Allah ya so ya gwada daya daga cikin ‘ya’yansa Dou Yi, sai ya aiko da ruhun zinare mai kama da yarinya don ya yaudari Dou Yi, amma Dou Yi bai ji motsi ba, daga baya, Dou Yi ya ga yarinyar ta zama haske ta zinare ta shiga karkashin kasa, sai ya tona. ƙasa kuma ya sami gwal na zinariya.
(Wannan labari misali ne na ra'ayin Dou Yi, ba don jarabar jima'i ba.)
聖意: Iyali → Amintacciya → Neman dukiya → Kasance da hankali a cikin ma'amaloli → Aure mai kwanciyar hankali → Hada kan Liujia → Maza masu tafiya a kasa → Suna da tsutsotsin siliki na Xintian → Kwanciyar dabbobi → Nemo mutane cikin kwanciyar hankali → Jinkirta shari'ar jama'a → Hijira mai aminci → Ajiye dukiyar da aka rasa → Duba rashin lafiya → Jingxing kabari → lebur
